attributes.action: The Human Rights Act Should be Reviewed Repealed and Rewritten
attributes.additional_details: The Human Rights Act Should be Reviewed Repealed and Rewritten - it must be discussed in Parliament as the Government are out of touch with what the british public want.  I am in the media and every night on my phone in people complain that the Human Rights Act is being abused.  It must be discussed and reviewed and rewritten.
